name: Galacticus, the time cheater
description:
Description:

This game is about experimenting what a 'TRUE' rewind mechanic  is. You play as Galacticus, an  alien who can control time itself at his will, being able to rewind EVERYTHING, life/death, movement, bullets, sounds...  Use this to advance and experiment through the level.

Controls:

L_MOUSE/R_MOUSE : Attack/Rewind weapon

SHIFT: Global rewind

WASD: Move

SPACE: Jump

Development:

Game developed during 1 week for the brackeys game jam, the theme was 'REWIND'. The game was done using Unity and Blender.
